content.raw:
Contact sensor states do not seem to be initialized and updated correctly. 

Problems:

i) a contact sensor is only initialized upon the first contact with an object, until then gazebo spams the console with "Error [ContactSensor.cc:237] Contact Sensor[/r2/right_leg_foot_force0_contact_sensor] has no collision[r2c_body::/r2/right_leg_foot_force0::/r2/right_leg_foot_force0_geom]" errors

ii) after losing contact with an object the contact sensor seems to keep the collision stored (i.e. collision object names and contact position(s)) and publishes it as contact with zero force instead of publishing an empty list (which would be the expected behaviour I guess)
content.html:
Contact sensor states do not seem to be initialized and updated correctly.

Problems:

i) a contact sensor is only initialized upon the first contact with an object, until then gazebo spams the console with "Error [ContactSensor.cc:237] Contact Sensor[/r2/right_leg_foot_force0_contact_sensor] has no collision[r2c_body::/r2/right_leg_foot_force0::/r2/right_leg_foot_force0_geom]" errors

ii) after losing contact with an object the contact sensor seems to keep the collision stored (i.e. collision object names and contact position(s)) and publishes it as contact with zero force instead of publishing an empty list (which would be the expected behaviour I guess)
